definition: to fill/to satisfy/to fulfill/to act in place of/substitute/sufficient/full

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: Thus, traditional JDC model should consider self-efficacy variable.
sentences.chinese: 因此，传统的JDC模型应充分考虑个体自我效能感。

sentences.english: First, in carrying out its work, the CD should respect and take into full consideration resolutions of the UNGA as it embodies the most representative multilateral mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 第一，开展工作时应充分考虑并尊重联大决议。

sentences.english: It is very important to pay attention to the physical and mechanical qualities of the rock foundation and the architectonic geological setting.
sentences.chinese: 应充分考虑岩石地基的物理力学性质及构造地质背景。

sentences.english: For operation security and machine durability, this skiving machine is designed to be made of quality parts and components.
sentences.chinese: 本机在设计中充分考虑到操作的安全性和耐久性。

sentences.english: In the reforms of the course, consider the unique ethnical characteristics of all the students fully.
sentences.chinese: 在课程的改革中，充分考虑所有学生独特的族群特征。

sentences.english: But they do not give sufficient weight to this impossibility.
sentences.chinese: 但是，他们没有充分考虑到衡量的不可能性。

sentences.english: Also, we shall pay more attention to the persistence of the environmental damage.
sentences.chinese: 还应充分考虑环境损害的长远性。

sentences.english: The Welsh Assembly Government said it would be "fully considering" the report.
sentences.chinese: 威尔士议会政府说这份报告值得“充分考虑”。

sentences.english: Such reality must be taken into full account when things are handled in China.
sentences.chinese: 中国办事情都要充分考虑上述国情。

sentences.english: In this stage the Seller's suggestions and modification opinions should be well considered.
sentences.chinese: 这一阶段要充分考虑卖方的建议和修改意见。

sentences.english: The volatility and valve train wear are the two difficulties encounted inthe formulation of low viscosity multigrade engine oil.
sentences.chinese: 研究和制备低粘度多级油应充分考虑挥发性和磨损。

sentences.english: You must make a liberal allowance for unforeseen circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 你必须充分考虑到预料不到的情况。

definition: to consider/to give serious consideration to sth/consideration
an overall plan taking into account all factors
to attend simultaneously to two or more things/to balance (career and family, family and education etc)
to follow/to abide by/to comply with/compliance
(idiom) to use methods in line with local circumstances
to give a more granular level of detail/to elaborate/to refine/to become more differentiated
